com.intellinum.mia.app.ui

Class FlexiUIObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellinum.mia.app.FlexiObject
      • com.intellinum.mia.app.ui.FlexiUIObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Application, Component, Container, Page, SideMenu

    public abstract class FlexiUIObject
extends com.intellinum.mia.app.FlexiObject
    Base UI Object for FLEXI framework All the UI Object extends from this base class Example : InputField, Div, Page and Application.

    • Field Detail

      • isFocus

        protected boolean isFocus

      • hidden

        protected boolean hidden
        Visibility state of the component

      • rendered

        protected java.lang.String rendered
        Visibility render type. Valid value are default, true, false and dynamic. If Dynamic, then rendered logic property is used

      • renderedLogic

        protected java.lang.String renderedLogic
        rendering logic. This property store the script that can be run at runtime to determine the rendered value dynamically. if the rendered property is true or false, then this property won't be used

      • eventListeners

                            throws com.intellinum.mia.app.event.PreventDefaultException

      • doAction

        public abstract void doAction(com.intellinum.mia.app.action.Action action)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Action taken when receive an input from server. when create a new UI class, override this function as needed For Example, when creating a new button UI class, it needs a special handle when the button is pressed. So the new class should override this function, using if commands to capture the SUBMIT action and then do the desired behaviour. if the commands is not SUBMIT, the pass it to the super.doAction;
        Parameters:
        action - SE
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isFocusable

        public abstract boolean isFocusable()
        is the object can receive focus override this function if the object is not focusable like header, separator, or readonly field.
        Returns:
        true : object can receive focus, false : object cannot receive focus
